name: @agent-web-portal/jsonata-portal
description: JSONata Portal - Lambda-based AWP for JSONata expression evaluation

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && bun build src/handler.ts --outfile dist/handler.mjs --target node --format esm --minify --external "@aws-sdk/*"
scripts.sam:local: bun run build && sam local start-api
scripts.sam:invoke: bun run build && sam local invoke JsonataPortalFunction
